Source code for tests.mockmodels

import pytest

from models import Task, Assignment, User



[docs]@pytest.fixture
def mock_get_sqlalchemy(mocker):
    """
    Get mocked object for test case

    :param mocker: Mocker object 
    :type mocker: Any 
    :raise:
    :return: Mocked object
    :rtype: Any

    """
    mock = mocker.patch(
        "flask_sqlalchemy.model._QueryProperty.__get__").return_value = mocker.Mock()
    return mock




[docs]@pytest.fixture
def mock_my_model():
    """
    Get mocked Task object

    :param: 
    :type: 
    :raise:
    :return: Mocked Task object
    :rtype: Task

    """
    my_model = Task(
        task_id="1",
        description="This is Task 1",
        points=10,
        deadline="2022-08-24"
    )
    return my_model

    Get mocked Task object

    :return: Mocked object

    """
    my_model = mocker.Mock()

    my_model.total_points = 33
    return my_model
